paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: exertional shortness of breath and palpitations

individual_records.phenotype_details: exertional shortness of breath and palpitations
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Multimodality imaging in the workup of a 70-year-old patient who is a carrier for the p.Val142Ile variant and who presented with exertional shortness of breath and palpitations.

functional_data.summary: The p.Val142Ile variant is associated with transthyretin tetramer instability.
assays: Functional assays assessing amyloid fibril formation

variants.population_frequency: Higher prevalence among people of African and Afro-Caribbean ancestry.
variants.additional_notes: The penetrance of the p.Val142Ile variant is variable and influenced by age.
key_quotes: In the United States, there is a higher prevalence of the p.Val142Ile mutation among people of African and Afro-Caribbean ancestry but with variable penetrance.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR gene variant was successfully extracted.
